base_description: Tall, rectangular, gray chest of drawers.
part_description: Five drawers stacked vertically with metal handles; rectangular shape.
internal_interaction_description: Each drawer slides in and out on metal tracks within the frame, allowing smooth movement. The drawers fit snugly within the frame, preventing wobbling. Handles are securely attached to the drawer fronts for easy pulling.
external_interaction_description: The chest interacts with the floor, standing upright due to its flat base. Users can pull drawers open to store or retrieve items. It can be placed against walls or in corners, complementing room decor while providing storage.
